title: Reading from a static in const fn leads to ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-const-fn
labels.description: Area: const fn foo(..) {..}. Pure functions which can be applied at compile time.
